name: In your Shadow
description: "In your Shadow" is a Visual Novel point-and click game that tells the story of three people: Lilly Emmett, Skyler Hasgrove, and Zachary Sorio. One night all three of their lives change in a second: Skyler is poisoned, Lilly is catfished and met with her sister's death once again, and Zachary gets a fateful phone call. After teaming up to find who brought these things on them, they find themselves in a life or death situation, and the player is lead through a comedic yet dramatic story that ends in an unpredictable way.
